questions.question: Which is the most popular JavaScript framework for building interactive web interfaces?

What does the 'v-bind' directive do in Vue.js?
options: Binds a JavaScript function to an event
Binds an HTML attribute to a JavaScript expression
Binds a component property to a parent component
Binds a variable to a template

questions.question: What is the purpose of the 'v-model' directive in Vue.js?
options: To render a list of items
To bind form input values to data properties
